title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
review: Psychological thriller with an unreliable narrator and shocking plot twists.
favlines: what you see not always true

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
review: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones
favlines: Every action is a vote for the type of person you wish to become

title: The Mysterious Affair at Styles
author: Agatha Christie
review: Poirot's first case – a locked-room mystery with clever twists.
favlines: Instinct is a marvelous thing. It can neither be explained nor ignored.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
author: Agatha Christie
review: A snowy train, 12 suspects, and Poirot’s moral dilemma.
favlines: The impossible must be possible in spite of appearances.
